EN:
British -style bar near Jitong.

After eating, I would like to find a bar and try to find a bar. I found this shop with a good evaluation on Google Maps.Although the big signboard was written in the store name Bar SEED, I decided to try it.

The wine wall in the store looks very rich and reliable. The whole decoration is also a British route, but the customer and the atmosphere feel that it is not the same as the type of bar that is usually more preferred, a little younger.

The#3 recommended by a lot of people is the flavor of Earl tea flavor, which really makes me change a little about the bar; The level of level is very comfortable and refreshing.

Another cup of Ganmei Bava's bartending is a thick body, and the taste is also greasy. I don't like it so much.The last Bye Bye Shot is tomato -flavored Rim. In fact, I am very powerful, especially I don't like tomatoes, and I still let me drink it smoothly.

Overall, if there are no other choices, you can drink a small drink for one or two cups. The bartending is good and the atmosphere in the store is easy.

Taipei must drink bars, handsome Bartender Lance humorous, intimate, talk, service, environmental atmosphere is great and easy, chat with friends and drink, you can also ask Bartender to recommend customized specialties if you want to drink. Tune, the bartender in the store is very special, and each cup is deeply loved by me.

The first Cup Earl Red Jade NO.3, used two kinds of counts to prepare the aroma of black tea, drink refreshing and smooth, with their self -roasted citrus delicious, and like the beginning of this cup.

The second cup of herb with Kerry, the micro -grass aroma with a sweet bartending, there is no mint leaves. Bartender helped me adjust the custom of a cup of deliciously.

The third cup of Barrot banning, the upper layer has dense air bubbles and the aroma of bartender, and it tastes very layered. It is delicious with their own dried fruit. It is delicious.

Thank you Lance for the shot, you must come again next time.

I have always wanted to go to the bar in Taipei, but now I finally realized (laughs).

I usually don't go to the bar (but I really like cocktails), so I always think that such bars will be a bit scary, but this place has a solid bar atmosphere of the bar, but it is not too much music.Comfortable!There are three bartenders in the store, but one of them is very friendly and talks about Japanese. Let us feel the feeling of guests, which suddenly eases my nervousness.

I entered the restaurant around 9pm on the weekend. At that time, there were three groups of customers in front of the counter. There were 1 groups of customers on the table in front of the counter, but it was full soon.Obviously there is a VIP room behind.

We have no snacks, but you can order from the fried food stores we cooperate with, and then send it to you (at least NT $ 300), so I think it is best to tell the bartender.

I personally like the golden wine cocktail, so in addition to the signature menu No. 3, I also ordered No. 6.Of course, No. 3 is delicious, but No. 6 is a new, shocking taste for me, and I was immediately fascinated.The small bubbles contain Laler and other fruits, but they are not overwhelming. My impression is that they are well matched and brought out the taste of each other in the cocktail.Then I wondered why Jin's face had such a kind expression.If you can't decide the menu, try!

This is the first time I sneaked into Taipei (laughs), which is very successful, and I like it very much, so I want to try it.

By the way, according to my Taiwanese acquaintances, this bar area is often used to entertain the Japanese ... so I think there are many Japanese signs haha.
